note:
Core (必須寄り) subset selected from the app's TOEIC_POOL in pool order; meanings intentionally left blank. Use tangocho_fill_meanings.html to fill meanings via your HF Spaces token. / meanings filled via HF Spaces /translate +posCandidates

2026-02-01: meanings corrected for several clearly wrong entries (e.g., aid, attend, audit, sale, tax, etc.) and removed posCandidates fields; POS is now determined in-app via offline dictionary.
POS fields added: pos (名/動/形/副), posCandidates (n/v/adj/adv).
